description: This source file defines a Fragment class ContentDetailsFragment that displays detailed information about a content item, including artwork, description, and action buttons for play, watchlist, and cast functionalities within an Android TV application. It leverages the Leanback library for UI components.

classes.name: ContentDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays detailed information about a ContentItem, including visuals and user actions, tailored for Android TV environments using Leanback components.

methods.name: ContentDetailsFragment.newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of ContentDetailsFragment with the specified ContentItem as an argument.

methods.name: ContentDetailsFragment.onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up the presenter selector, adapter, details row, and handles action click listeners.

methods.name: ContentDetailsFragment.onStart
methods.description: Loads the main artwork asynchronously into the details overview row when the fragment becomes visible.
